content: One of my colleagues has unfortunately registered one of our packages on General before we had agreed on a name or (I thought!) agreed to publish it. So... I want to change the name of one of our packages that is already on General - is that possible? Or do I just register a new package?

Apologies - answering my own question from the README in JuliaRegistries/General - it turns out you can't - https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General#how-do-i-rename-an-existing-registered-package - but there are things you can do to at least keep continuity of version numbers, etc.
Richard Reeve has marked this topic as resolved.
